title: Marcy and Bruce Benson Fellowship Fund for Excellence
description: To provide graduate fellowship support for students in the Department of Geological Sciences.  If total gifts equal or exceed $1,000,000 within five years from the date the Fund is established, the Fund shall be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: In recognition of the remarkable leadership of Marcy and Bruce Benson, this endowed fellowship fund enables CU Boulder to recruit, retain and graduate the most exceptional graduate students in Geological Sciences.
